string:
Snowboard?
 Yes          No<ask>

Do you know how?
 Yes          No<ask>

Use the snowー
board on the
snow… There are
obstacles,
so avoid them by
using the
Control Pad.
Ready?!

Are you done?
 Yes          No<ask>

Yeah! You're
an expert!

Cool! Get the
S ranking next!

Good job! Keep
up the good
work!

Try a little
harder…

You need a lot
more practice!

Wow!! A new
record!

Go to the
advanced
course?

Since you've
set a new
record, I'll
tell you a
little juicy
info! There
might be a
Power Berry on
the tree in the
grass field in
the Winter…

Lucky! I've got
a Power Berry!
It was worth
falling down!

I'm not done!
 Yes          No<ask>

I'll come back
soon!

Go to the
advanced course?

 Yes          No<ask>

Complete! You're
the King of
Snowboarding!

Great! You may
want to try a
harder course?

Good. Polish up
your techniques!

Well, it's too
hard for you
right now.

No! Go home
before you hurt
yourself.

Fantastic! A
new record!

Let's not
snowboard at
night.
